DOC.criteria: Key Inclusion criterion : 1 . Patients must sign informed consent assessment 2 . Patients pathologically and/or clinically confirm diagnosis stage IV nonsmall ( squamous nonsquamous ) cell lung cancer ( NSCLC ) stage III/IV adenocarcinoma pancreas . 3 . Patients stage IV NSCLC receive complete discontinued standard chemotherapy chemotherapynaive choice . 4 . Patients stage III/IV pancreatic adenocarcinoma receive standard chemotherapy chemotherapy . If patient receive chemotherapy , change chemotherapy expect . 5 . Greater equal 5 % unintentional weight loss previous 36 month , explain simple starvation . Simple starvation consider exclude weight loss ameliorate standard nutritional counseling oral supplementation 2 week period . 6 . Body mass index ( BMI ) â‰¤ 30 kg/m2 . 7 . Patients receive investigational antineoplastic therapy within 3 week screen 2 . Evidence inadequate organ brain function , define lab test image 3 .
